text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Galápagos Province | native_name = | other_name = | settlement_type = Province | image_skyline = Galapagos-satellite-esislandnames.jpg | image_caption = Satellite photo of the Galapagos islands | image_flag = Bandera Provincia Galápagos.svg | image_seal = | image_shield = | nickname = Archipelago of Galapagos | image_map = Ecuador Galapagos province.svg | map_caption = Location of Galápagos Province | image_map1 = Cantones de Galápagos.png | map_caption1 = Cantons of Galápagos Province | pushpin_map = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | established_title = Created | established_date = February 18, 1973 | named_for = Galápagos Islands | seat_type = Capital | seat = Puerto Baquerizo Moreno | parts_type = Cantons | parts_style = col | parts = List of cantons | p1 = Isabela | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Jorge Torres (2008-) | area_total_km2 = 45000 | area_land_km2 = 8010 | area_water_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | elevation_min_m = 0 | elevation_min_ft = | population_total = 25124 | population_as_of = 2010 census | population_footnotes = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_urban = 7475 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = (0)5 | iso_code = EC-W | registration_plate = W | blank_name_sec1 = Languages | blank_info_sec1 = Spanish and English | website = | p2 = San Cristóbal | p3 = Santa Cruz | elevation_max_m = 1710 | elevation_max_ft = | timezone = GALT | utc_offset = -6 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | blank_name_sec2 = HDI (2017) | blank_info_sec2 = 0.801 · 2nd | official_name = | Can = | translit_lang1 = | imagesize = | p4 = | subdivision_type6 = | pq = }} Galápagos () is a province of Ecuador in the country's Insular region. It is located off the western coast of the mainland. The capital is Puerto Baquerizo Moreno. The province has the Galápagos Islands, a group of tiny volcanic islands that sit on the equator. ==Political divisions== The province is divided in three cantons, each with a number of islands. They are: Canton Area (km²) Capital Principal islands Isabela 1,780 5,367 Puerto Villamil Darwin, Fernandina, Isabela, Wolf 6,142 849 Española, Floreana, Genovesa, San Cristóbal, Santa Fe Santa Cruz 11,262 1,794 Puerto Ayora Baltra, Bartolomé, Marchena, North Seymour, Pinta, Pinzón, Rábida, Santa Cruz, Santiago Galápagos 19,184 8,010 Puerto Baquerizo Moreno Censo de Población y Vivienda, Galápagos 2006 . Instituto Nacional de Estadistica y Censos (INEC). ==References==
